extension.name: Content - JExtBOX Equation
extension.author: Makhgal Ganbold
extension.description:
This free light plugin helps to display math equations (LaTeX) and figures (PSPicture).

Visit www.JExtBOX.com for the full version:

  1. Supports all front-end components and modules
  2. Renders equations which are added to the DOM by AJAX
  3. An editor button and a pop-up modal window for inserting math easily
  4. Live preview before inserting an equation with the pop-up modal window
  5. Skips HTML tags inside pre and code
  6. Clean up horizontal spaces at the beginning of each line after the line equations
  7. MathJax version selection for CDN, local installation support, fallback to local installation, custom configuration of MathJax
